entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
